content: **crocheted christmas star in drops daisy and drops kid-silk the piece is worked in the round from the middle outwards theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern da-010 yarn groups b + a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** approx 10½ cm in diameter **yarn** drops daisy from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 01 off white and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 25 g colour 14 red / 32 raspberry / 34 sage green / 41 powder / 42 almond / 45 soft mint / 47 pistachio ice cream + a left-over drops glitter colour gold for loop 1 star weighs approx 6 g **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 4 5 mm **crochet gauge** 16 treble crochets in width and 9 row in height with 1 strand of each quality = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
